title: Is there any software that can both mix and master music by itself? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sort of… the Ozone products are pretty easy to use and can pretty easily turn a crappy mix into something listenable there are also a number of online mastering services really though, if you want your music to sound “right” no program has your particular taste. mixing is an artform (albeit a subservient one) all its own, the best tack to take if you don't want to bother with it yourself is to pony up the cash and get someone to mix it for you

There are softwares and service, which can do this to some extent, especially for mastering. For example Landr is an online service, which uses an algorithm to master your music according to your requirements and the genre, but it will never get close to having a real, human mastering engineer work on your track. Each piece of music will require different treatment and that’s a fact. They will certainly get better in years to come, but nothing beats a human touch. For quality online mixing and mastering: www.globalsoundgroup.com/mixingandmastering
